attributes.action: Shorten the 6 week holidays to 4/5 weeks
attributes.additional_details: 6 weeks is too long for all children especially children with SEN who need routine. Working parents struggle with childcare within the 6 weeks holidays which makes working difficult. Cost of living means that parents who stay at home with their children cannot afford to enjoy the holidays and are mainly stuck in the house, causing mental health issues also. Structure and routine are what every child needs.
attributes.background: Shorten the 6 week summer holidays to 5 with an extra week in october/chirstmas

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The length and timing of school holidays and term times are decisions for individual schools and local authorities.
